definition: unpleasantly harsh or grating in sound, optical device consisting of a surface with many parallel grooves in it
details:
adjective
- unpleasantly harsh or grating in sound
= synonyms: rough
noun
- optical device consisting of a surface with many parallel grooves in it
= synonyms: diffraction grating
- a frame of iron bars to hold a fire
= synonyms: grate
- a barrier that has parallel or crossed bars blocking a passage but admitting air
= synonyms: grate
